text: Gariadhar is a city and a municipality in Bhavnagar district in the state of Gujarat, India. ==Geography== Gariadhar is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Gariadhar It has an average elevation of 83 metres (272 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Gariadhar had a population of 30,520. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Gariadhar has an average literacy rate of 65%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 73%, and female literacy is 56%. In Gariadhar, 15% of the population is under 6 years of age. Its food gathiya and kali કળી is a very famous product in Gujarat. ==People from Gariadhar== Gariadhar is famous for being the home town the saint Valamram, disciple of Bhoja Bhagat, whose ashram and samadhi is located here. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Bhavnagar district
title: Gariadhar
